key_points: U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders became a viral meme for his attire at the presidential inauguration.
Sanders wore a Burton jacket and home-made wool mittens, standing out among designer outfits.
His 'practical Vermont dad look' sparked a wave of creative and humorous memes across the internet.
Memes placed Sanders in various scenarios, from sitting on a park bench with Tom Hanks to attending the Yalta Conference.
The mittens Sanders wore were gifted by Vermont teacher Jen Ellis, made from repurposed wool sweaters.
Sanders' practical attire is seen as reflective of his straightforward political style.
Jokes about Sanders running errands after the inauguration circulated, mentioning activities like mailing taxes.
Lester Kiewit and @BoxrecGrey, among others, contributed to the social media conversation with humorous takes.
The meme phenomenon showcases Sanders' unexpected fashion icon status and broad online appeal.
Sanders' appearance was distinct at the historically significant event, blending practicality with a touch of unexpected light-heartedness.
